mapper.insert: insert into contract (id, basic_salary, allowance, contract, created_date, user_id, insurance_type, insurance_money, status) value (#{id}, #{basicSalary}, #{allowance}, #{contract}, NOW(), #{user.id}, #{insuranceType}, #{insuranceMoney}, #{status})
mapper.update: UPDATE contract SET basic_salary = #{basicSalary}, allowance = #{allowance}, contract = #{contract}, insurance_type = #{insuranceType}, insurance_money = #{insuranceMoney} WHERE id = #{id};
